physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a double storey roofed building. There are numerous doors on the first floor and railings on the second floor. Trees can be seen in the foreground and background of the photograph.
title_text: JAG (Judge Advocate General) Office, Goodwood Park Hotel Singapore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Goodwood Park Hotel Offices
